nodes.text: Seltaya Minor, also known as or Ropagi III, was a planet in the Kira sector of the Expansion Region.
The planet served as a pirate base for the Telak's Terrors, which plagued the Enarc Run under the command of Kird Telak.

While Twin Stars of Kira placed the system in the Expansion Region, Wanted by Cracken mentioned a planet called Seltaya and placed it in the Mieru'kar sector in the Outer Rim. Both sources described Seltaya as an ice world and homebase to a group of pirates. This contradiciton was solved with the publication of The Essential Atlas, which retconned the Seltaya from Wanted by Cracken to be Seltaya Major in the Seltaya Major system and Seltaya from Twin Stars of Kira to be Seltaya Minor (or Ropagi III) in the Ropagi system.
